metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7944 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The RESTful control interface (aka RAPI or ganeti-rapi) in Ganeti before2.9.7, 2.10.x before 2.10.8, 2.11.x before 2.11.8, 2.12.x before 2.12.6,2.13.x before 2.13.3, 2.14.x before 2.14.2, and 2.15.x before 2.15.2, whenused in SSL mode, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(resource consumption) via SSL parameter renegotiation.

criterions.comment: ganeti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
